greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of partitions of n into distinct repdigits of digits of n.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
program: a131364 n = p [r | r <- tail a010785_list, head (show r) `elem` show n] n
p (k:ks) m = if m < k then 0 else p ks (m - k) + p ks m
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 03 2007, Jul 20 2007
ext: a(0)=1 added and offset adjusted by _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 10 2011
